title: SR & Bilgewater Music bug
body: its playing the Old SR music instead of the events music :(

replies.body:
Hey Kaminox,

Are you experiencing this in a custom or a matchmade game?

The music feature does not work on Custom Games.

If you're experiencing this in matchmade games, could you tell me which queue?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stephiroth,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mx03qwGn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-30T06:05:41.625+0000)
>
> Hey Kaminox,
> 
> Are you experiencing this in a custom or a matchmade game?
> 
> The music feature does not work on Custom Games.
> 
> If you're experiencing this in matchmade games, could you tell me which queue?

i think it fixed but yesterday i updated to windows 10 and i saw a post about how to change it and i did but it was the Classic SR. but as i said it may be fixed idk i can test it again to see i'll let you know on the results and no i was in a PVP.

Hey Kaminox,

Which PVP queue were you in when this occurred?

If it is fixed, please let me know as well. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stephiroth,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mx03qwGn,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-30T21:24:04.405+0000)
>
> Hey Kaminox,
> 
> Which PVP queue were you in when this occurred?
> 
> If it is fixed, please let me know as well. :D

i was in the black market brawlers i had to test my fps before playing ranked and its fixed! :D

its happening to me too and it doesnt give me the option to change the music since the only option is "Updated"

its happened to me in SR draft pick, Teambuilder, and recently the Black water market. in ARAM it works fine

Hey Silverthane,

since you're saying you're only seeing the choice for Updated, I think you may be experiencing a bug with the HUD where sometimes in menus that scroll, it does not show all of the options. This bug will be fixed in 5.15.

However, the Bilgewater option should be there, it's just hard to see.

Could you try one more time, with the Theme Music dropdown selected (or clicked), and with your cursor hovered directly over the "Updated" option, and THEN scroll down and see if the Bilgewater option appears?

Hope this works!

The reason the music works for the ARAM is because it's the only track available :)
I have the same problem, I've noticed it playing the new mode on SR.
